name: Fate and other shenanigans
description:
Magic, Mystery, Divination? That's what fortune telling should be about, but not when it comes to you. 

That doesn't mean that what you do doesn't require any skill. It's an art form in it's own right to be able to read your customer, find out whats on their minds and tell them what they want to hear! Do it well, and they pay you, maybe even a bonus, and you're gonna need that bonus or you wont be able to pay that fine you got for scamming people!

Lay cards for five characters in this visual-novel-style Game Jam Game. Try to predict what will keep them invested the longest, or explore the branching paths of what happens if you don't - just watch out, a cop has his eye on you... 

If you do too poorly, he will close down your booth by the end of the day!

The game was made with a collab for the HTK Game Jam 2021. 

Direction & Storytelling: Lu Klan

Programming:  Felix Eßbach & Kjell Banck

Sounds: Lu Klan & Kjell Banck

Artworks: Celina Wendrich

Character Design: Leon Vong

UI Design: Clara Dittmann
